PERSONA:
meet 68-year-old dr. eric thompson, a retired university professor living in the suburban outskirts of portland, oregon. born and raised in the united states, eric is a white non-hispanic male who identifies as a protestant and regularly attends his local church services once a week. he is married to his high school sweetheart, susan, a retired librarian, and they have two adult children who are both pursuing successful careers in engineering and medicine.

eric holds a ph.d. in environmental science from the university of california, berkeley, which he obtained after completing his undergraduate studies at the university of oregon. his academic background and passion for environmental conservation have shaped his liberal views on policies related to climate change, education, and healthcare.

eric is a proud democrat and considers himself a liberal, often participating in local campaigns and volunteering for environmental organizations in his free time. his experience as a professor has given him a strong appreciation for the importance of education, leading him to support increased funding for public schools and affordable higher education.

financially, eric and his wife are comfortably retired, with a combined annual income of $95,000. they own a cozy two-story house in the suburbs, which they purchased in the 1980s. eric is an avid user of the internet, often spending several hours a day staying up-to-date on current events, reading online news articles, and participating in online forums related to environmental conservation.

as a retired professor, eric has the time and resources to engage in his community, volunteering at a local park clean-up initiative and participating in neighborhood watch programs. his experience as an educator has taught him the importance of community involvement, and he believes it is essential for creating positive change.

eric's economic concerns are centered around ensuring a sustainable retirement and maintaining access to quality healthcare. he is deeply invested in the upcoming election, particularly in candidates who prioritize environmental policies and affordable healthcare. eric's personal values of social responsibility, education, and environmental stewardship drive his political views, making him a reliable supporter of liberal policies and democratic candidates.
